name: The Sandwiching
description:
The Sandwiching is a game prototype for the Feb 2017 ICT Game Jam in Wichita, KS by The Games Bureau, from members of Quickdraw Studios. The theme for the jam was "sandwiches" - and while we were initially very underwhelmed by the theme, we had a great time creating the art assets and gameplay mechanics for our game.

The premise of the game is that your character is the main feature of a sandwich in the making and you are trying to escape the sandwich! Ham, Tuna, Egg, and Cow must all play together (four-player local co-operative play!) and escape. Anyone who doesn't make it must doom the team to sandwich heaven or be left behind.
